availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, farmer. South Carolina native. Married to Sarah "Sally" Fletcher. Father of Elizabeth Fletcher, John Fletcher, Jacob R. Fletcher, James Wesley Fletcher, Terrill Fletcher, Franklin Fletcher, Lewis W. Fletcher, Marshall Fletcher, Sarah J. Fletcher, Rhoda T. Fletcher, and Henry Fletcher. Farmer in Roane County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Christian County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Roane County, Subdivision 20, p. 392A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, p. 603.
